title: Ancestral Post
description: post with two figures; bottom maternity figure is kneeling and holding two sticks presented vertically and touching the base of the post; bottom figure supports a circular bowl shaped platform which supports a male equestrian figure with elaborate saddle and trappings; figure wears a conical shaped crown decorated with the faces of past rulers; metal mount
creditline: The William Hood Dunwoody Fund and Gift of funds from Kevin and Polly Hart
